page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: The children of the island play football, on the beach and on their bikes. If they have to play indoors they watch television if the generator is on, read or play lego. Many of the adults are interested in gardening, mainly vegetables to supplement the supplies from Mallaig. Many adults enjoy walking and collect drift wood and fish boxes from the shore. In winter it gets dark earlier than in summer so more indoor activities such as home brewing, sewing, reading, wood working and watching television take place. Last winter there was enough snow for some people to go skiing on Sanday.
